conclusion: The car (A) enters from the lower right corner and moves towards the cubes, which are stationary and spread out across the green surface.

The car first collides with the red cube, causing the red cube to move slightly and the car to change direction.
After hitting the red cube, the car hits the green cubes nearby, causing them to shift positions slightly.
The car continues to deflect off these cubes, adjusting its path with each collision.
The car eventually comes to rest near the cluster of cubes it collided with.
The red and green cubes are displaced from their original positions due to the collisions.
The car will stop near the red and green cubes after deflecting off them, with the exact final position depending on the combined effects of each collision.
